channel.title: How can i change shop Locations on my server? Please (read more)
channel.description: How could i change my Coordinates on my server? i wanted to change to change 2 of the shops with each other. it's difficult because i tryed and i didnt know what i was oing . please somoene explain step by step how to do it. i think my server is kinda diffrent then other 317's my server is a mustanscap3 server. please help.!

item.title: How can i change shop Locations on my server? Please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

ok but how do i know where the coodrinates for another place are? like listen i only wan to change 2 shops which are my staffzone shop to my normal shop spce. kinda like swap shops but while whole npc etc… could you explain to me again please? thank you.

item.source: How can i change shop Locations on my server? Please (read more)

item.title: How can i change shop Locations on my server? Please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

This isn’t a spoon-feeding community but since you’re new i’ll help.

In Autospawn.cfg, find the NPC id of the NPC you wish to move.

Then go to the new spot and get those coordinates, you then want to change the first 2 coordinates of the NPC save and run the server, no need to compile for CFG files.

Read full topic
